name: 陳殿榮
objective: 克希荷夫定律(KCL, KVL)及綱目電流法、節點電位法及重疊定律、載維寧定律等之電路計算技巧應用；RLC電路之一階、二階電路之暫態自然響應及相量式之於弦波函數穩態分析。
schedule:
1. Circuits Variables and Laws 1.5週
2. Properties of Resistive Circuits 2週
3. Applications of Resistive Circuits 2週
4. Energy Storage and Dynamic Circuits 2.5週
期中考週
5. AC Circuits 3週
6. Transient Response 2.5週
7. Frequency Response and Filters 2.5週
期末考週

Circuits
--Engineering concepts and analysis of linear electric circuits
by A. Bruce Carlson
